title: Charlie Cunningham and Jacquie Phelan’s Video Postcard
content:
In 1993, Jacquie Phelan and Charlie Cunningham filmed this with Erik Gordon Bainbridge as part of a get well video postcard for their sick friend Brian.

The post Charlie Cunningham and Jacquie Phelan’s Video Postcard appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
